idea:
We are going to offer basically two products to clients.


First: User friendly Comparison and option of best available Interest rate in FD and alternative investment option to Clients. In first stage redirect the client to bank's site to enable online creation of FD and in 2nd Stage enabling platform to allow them make FD of any listed Bank on our site with a target of highest 2 minute process.


Second: User friendly comparison of best available finance rate for Housing Loan and Car loan, in consonance of income and pan data provided by client and redirect them to bank's portal to apply online. In second stage to gather data at portal stage and provide banks ready to finance files and facilitate clients.
